FIPS PUB 200

U.S. Federal Cybersecurity Compliance Part II: FIPS 200

FIPS PUB 200 is one of nine series of computer system security standards for the U.S Government. It is important to note that both, FIPS 199 and FIPS 200 are mandatory security standards required by FISMA.
